title: Buffing some items      this is for you riot/ballance team
body:
Passives not included as they can be infinitely valuable or worthless 


So iv been looking at some items and some are week like 
Zephyr                     
+25 Attack Damage
+50% Attack Speed
+10% Movement Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction
Now I'm not saying its bad its not but  there are better items like a 
Phantom Dancer         
+50% Attack Speed
+35% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed
Now this is a better item on most champs that need attack speed and move speed I think a good way to fix zephyr is to make it 50 ad and not 25 ad this would give champs like {{champion:429}} {{champion:48}}{{champion:5}}  so on a better way to get that attack speed they need so much and not have stats they don't need or use 

Now on to Ohmwrecker with 
+300 Health
+50 Armour
+150% Base Health Regen 
+10% Cooldown Reduction
 Is a good item the passive makes it good but no one knows it exist just a small buff say 50 to 100 health would make it known to a lot more people  

Guinsoo's Rageblade
+30 Attack Damage
+40 Ability Power
This is the same thing as Ohmwrecker no one knows it exist a small buff is all it needs perhaps to its passive 

Essence Reaver 
+80 Attack Damage
+10% Life Steal
+10% Cooldown Reduction
Ad a good passive on it is under rated but not many champs need mana if they are using ad life steal a small buff would make it more valuable to champs like {{champion:110}} {{champion:126}} who need a {{item:3043}} to be worth picking late game but loss a lot of mana with 1 ability 

Twin Shadows 
+80 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+6% Movement Speed
Is a good item if you can get the passive off but most champs have the move speed to just outrun the ghost perhaps a buff to the move speed of such ghost would make this item better to get 

Now there are more but these are probably the most under rated or wots the word opposite to op well you get it and just a small buff to these will make the game a lot more divers and fun and bring a lot more players to league of legends 

P.s we can get to champions next time but until then I will be looking at patch notes and playing league of legends snakeowen out ow and plz vote.

replies.body:
Zephyr is kinda in an odd place, idk what to do there but adding 25 AD to it won't help as Kalista doesn't even do very well with flat AD, Essense reaver should apply to physical damage in general, at least with reduced effect.

Twin shadows is awesome, never diss the twin shadows. Slower movement speed gives them a chance to save themselves from whatever doom comes after the slow

Essence Reaver is already a solid item on Blue Ezreal, Varus and Jayce. Just because it's a niche item doesn't mean it sucks. I guess a few of the others you mentioned could do with some buffs though.
yes I agree but no one gets them as they have not tried them and a small buff 1% 25 ad so on will make people be like omg is this a new item but yes it is good

no hate here wether or not you think I'm right or not I don't wont to here how stupid I am or what ever the 12 year olds say just vote above and go love and kisses to you all even the 12 year olds ty and peace.
